title: Rogers St.
alt: 'We can also use middle names in place of first pet's names, but yours is something incomprehensible about dropping tables.'
transcript:
[A person with long curly hair is standing to the right of a hanging crocked on the wall behind him. A person speaks from off-panel (a judge of some sort according to the official transcript). Given the title text there is reason to believe the long haired "woman" is indeed a man named Bobby Tables.]
Sign: Auditions
Judge: Seriously?
Judge: Sorry, no, that's a huge mood killer.
Judge: Next![Caption below the panel]
Before I have a kid, I'm moving to Rogers Street in Cambridge, MA, and then getting a cat named "Mister"
Just to guarantee the kid will never go into porn.
